thread.section_title: Olive Oil Lovers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Olive Oil Lovers | oliveoillovers.com
thread.title: Sherry L.
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by Sherry L.

author: Sherry L.
title: Sherry L.
text: I ordered and received olive oil in March 2017 to give as gifts for upcoming birthdays in April & May 2017. I was very disappointed to see that the "best by" date on my olive oil said May 2017. This left me wondering if this is why I got a good deal on it. I would be embarrassed to give these as gifts because the expiration date is right around the corner!
